r.d: Yaf is a PHP framework similar to zend framework, which is written in c and built as PHP extension
r.n: - Fixed bug that baseUri set to wrong value (affected version: 2.1.10, 2.1.11) - Fixed bug Yaf_View_Simple crash while calling assign if construct it with no tpl_dir - Fixed bug that Yaf_View_Simple::display doesn't convert controller name
